name: Hitler VS T-Rex 3D
description:
Winner of 3 GOTY awards

Ubish*t introduces:

Hitler VS T-Rex 3D

Dramatic storyline, intense gun battles, amazing graphics, stunning UI, this game is a AAA quality game set in WW2, it features Hitler going against his rival, T-Rex, the player can play as either, and the result is in your hands, win or loose, this game will show you what Ubish*t isn't capable of (good servers)

*Works best on Android*

*No more Windows updates for a while*

*All Nazism is for entertainment purposes only*
